cookies.Power: To claim the cookie of power the block number must end in 420.
cookies.Wisdom: To claim the cookie of wisdom, submit a number. If the hash of that number is greater than the hash of the previous number, you get the cookie.
cookies.Time: Anyone can claim this cookie if it has been greater than 1 week since the last claim date.
cookies.War: If the block number is a even number, anyone can claim this cookie.
cookies.Wealth: Anyone can claim this cookie if they spend more than the previous claimer.
